column5: Picked one up for a good price at Lebaron seems pretty nice. Anyone used one?
I picked one up before Christmas. Used it on my NZ trip. It is a nice solid rod. Hoping I'll get to use it in Florida in March.
I got the medium action and it can be used as a 7 or 8 foot rod . Supposedly it was 200 dollars on clearance for 90? Should fit in the overhead by the look of it
